blogPost.excerpt: June is instant product analytics - just connect your Segment account. ⚡️ Fast and easy to set up (< 2 minutes) 🤯 No expertise required 📊 Instant Reports 📚 Out-of-the-box Templates 👉 Give it a try: https://june.so
blogPost.body: June is instant product analytics - just connect your Segment account. ⚡️ Fast and easy to set up (< 2 minutes) 🤯 No expertise required 📊 Instant Reports 📚 Out-of-the-box Templates 👉 Give it a try: https://june.so
blogPost.title: June 1.0 - Instant analytics reports on top of Segment
blogPost.author: Thibaud Elziere

localize.description: 六月是即时产品分析--只需连接你的Segment账户。⚡️ 快速而简单的设置（<2分钟） 🤯 无需专业知识 📊 即时报告 📚 开箱即用的模板 👉 试试吧：https://june.so。
localize.tagline: 在Segment之上的即时分析报告

localize.description: 六月是即時產品分析--只需連接你的Segment賬戶。⚡️ 快速而簡單的設置（<2分鐘） 🤯 無需專業知識 📊 即時報告 📚 開箱即用的模板 👉 試試吧：https://june.so。
localize.tagline: 在Segment之上的即時分析報告

previous.excerpt: React Native ARIA provides a set of React hooks that handles behaviour, accessibility and interactions so you can implement custom components and design systems for Android, iOS and Web.
previous.title: React Native ARIA - React Hooks to make accessible React Native design systems

localize.description: React Native ARIA提供了一套处理行为、可访问性和交互的React钩子，因此你可以为Android、iOS和Web实现自定义组件和设计系统。
localize.tagline: React Hooks让React Native设计系统无障碍化

localize.description: React Native ARIA提供了一套處理行爲、可訪問性和交互的React鉤子，因此你可以爲Android、iOS和Web實現自定義組件和設計系統。
localize.tagline: React Hooks讓React Native設計系統無障礙化

next.excerpt: Doppler is a beautifully designed music player designed and built for people who buy music. Import music and playlists to listen offline, and edit song and album artwork and info without syncing. Now with support for Siri, Spotlight Search, and CarPlay.
next.title: Doppler 2.3 - iOS music player for people who buy music

localize.description: 多普达是一款设计精美的音乐播放器，专为购买音乐的人设计和打造。导入音乐和播放列表进行离线收听，并在不同步的情况下编辑歌曲和专辑封面和信息。现在支持Siri、Spotlight搜索和CarPlay。
localize.tagline: 为购买音乐的人准备的iOS音乐播放器

localize.description: 多普達是一款設計精美的音樂播放器，專爲購買音樂的人設計和打造。導入音樂和播放列表進行離線收聽，並在不同步的情況下編輯歌曲和專輯封面和信息。現在支持Siri、Spotlight搜索和CarPlay。
localize.tagline: 爲購買音樂的人準備的iOS音樂播放器
